Gameplay is both fun and extremely tense all through out\, and its story is compelling once you take the time to really pay attention and analyze all it's little details. And if you are into cinema\, you surely will appreciate all the hard work put into crafting it's scenes\, as these show some of the best acting and directing ever put on a videogame\, as well as a beautiful (and depressing) world.It is definetely not for everyone\, as some of the risks it takes don't really work out in the end (also\, one could definetely tell it's maker's political views while playing the game\, which could make the experience less enjoyable if you don't agree with these views) .
